definition: residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: The building massing was resolved into a U shape that recalls traditional triple house courtyard familiar to the local people.
sentences.chinese: 建築體呈U型，讓人聯想到當地人熟悉的三合院。

sentences.english: Grandpa's cottage is a traditional three-section compound, which covers a big area.
sentences.chinese: 老家是三合院式的建築，面積很大。

definition: courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
Pingfang district of Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1] in Heilongjiang
